caption: (Translated by Google) I beg you not to go, the ingredients are not fresh, and the waiter is in a hurry, only asking if we want to add soup, and I am ashamed to ask us to tip so much, the price is unreasonable, the variety is small, and the drinks have to be added. Hundred yuan, I don’t understand why this kind of shop hasn’t closed down.  (Original) 求求你们不要去，食材不新鲜，服务员手忙脚乱，只会问要不要加汤，也好意思叫我们拿那么多小费，价格不合理，品种很少，饮料还要另外加钱，两个人吃了一百块，不懂这种店为什么还不倒闭。
Overpriced, seafood isn't very fresh either. We were told there were social distancing but we ended up surrounded with other customers, left asap. Would not return/recommend

(Translated by Google) The attitude of the female chess table manager is extremely bad. I am going to consume, not by you. Is it because Aunt Lai is in a bad mood and angers customers? I really think I am a boss. The seafood is not fresh, and the result of going for the seafood is so disappointing. It’s nothing, the price is the most expensive in the whole Eight Avenues!  (Original) 女棋台经理态度极其恶劣 我是去消费的 不是受你的气。是来姨妈心情不好气发顾客身上吗？真当自己是老板娘了。海鲜不新鲜，冲着海鲜去的结果让人太失望了。要什么没什么，价格还全八大道最贵！

(Translated by Google) The ingredients are not fresh, the sanitation is poor, and the most garbage hot pot restaurant! ! ! Eat seafood hot pot, not to mention other things, at least seafood should be fresh, it feels almost smelly, the more you eat, the more irritating and expensive! ! !  (Original) 食材不新鲜，卫生差，最垃圾的火锅店！！！吃海鲜火锅 其他不说  起码海鲜要新鲜，感觉都快臭了，越吃越恼火，还贵！！！

(Translated by Google) I used to visit this place often. This time the worst in history. The hot pot was cold, the food was not fresh, and there were no swimming shrimps. It was changed to bunches, not even a radish or winter melon. The boss also said that the cut was broken and no one had eaten it, so he cancelled it. Don’t you want to eat seafood, is the seafood fresh? The swimming prawns are all replaced with frozen prawns of a pound and a few pieces. Excuse me, 38.5 before tax, but there are not even the most basic things, and the price is still rising. The grade is getting lower and lower! The dishes are not even washed! Quite speechless! Now it’s deserted and there are no customers. Should you improve your quality more than thinking about the difficulties of the epidemic and reducing your feelings for customers. When customers have comments, they rebut plausibly. Where is their quality and grade without reviewing them? ! Never gave a bad review, the first time in history.  (Original) 以前也经常来这家，这次有史以来最最差劲的一次，火锅都吃凉了，东西还不新鲜，游水虾都没有，改成串串，连个萝卜，冬瓜都没有。老板还说切了没人吃都坏了所以就取消了，你们不是就要吃海鲜，请问海鲜新鲜吗？游水虾全换成一磅几块的冰冻虾，请问税前38.5💲却连最最基本的东西都没有，价格还上涨。档次却越来越低！连盘子都没有洗干净！相当无语！现在冷冷清清的，没什么客人，你们是不是更应该把自己的质量提升，而不是一直想着疫情困难，缩减了对顾客的感受。当顾客有意见提出来，却振振有词的反驳。却不检讨自己的质量和档次在哪里？！从没有给人差评过，有史以来第一次。

(Translated by Google) I ordered two incense pots at 2020.7.10 in the evening, and the charge was about $60. The portion size is small and the food is low. It is not possible for two people to eat. It is not recommended that you patronize in the future. This is the most deceptive store during the epidemic.  (Original) 我在2020.7.10晚上定了兩個香鍋，收費大概$60. 份量少，食料少. 兩個人吃還吃不行，不建議大家以後光顧.這是疫情期間最騙人的店.
(Translated by Google) tasty  (Original) 味道不错
(Translated by Google) Poor hygiene, poor ingredients, diarrhea after eating a few.  (Original) 卫生差，食材差，吃完几个都拉肚子了。

The menu says the kids no matter you are three or two or four, if your kids height is above 1 m . You need pay for food . My kid only three and she didn’t eat seafood, she just ate few vegetables noodles and meat , they charged me 10.99 dollar. But not 7.99 for regular hotpot. Cause she is above 1 m and the server took her to measure the height . It is kinda not respectful .But if your kids is four or three under 1m , you don’t need pay money. No matter your kids eat lots of food . It is free. It not depends on ages but by height. It is radiculous .
Goog place!
(Translated by Google) good to eat  (Original) 好吃
Great value
We have the KTV suite for 15 ppl. The seafood qualities are pretty good and various. The serving speed is fast and accurate. This is important for all you can eat.

(Translated by Google) Not one of the worst pot Just a single point when the dish has 10 points like three things not on the first round of the points on the leak finally on. When eating the waiter has to add to the soup I would like to ask you how it is not a one-time Cadogan point six times. I eat the mood was destroyed and did not want to eat soup eat more salty thorough mood. 2 minutes a waiter came in two minutes is a variety of additional staff to change a variety of dishes plus soup super messy exm? I eat hot pot meal As for you. The most deadly list the waiter knew was wrong and gave us a list? (No point other bar guests point table wine list we added up and then we heard the conversation from near the front desk. Knew was wrong not to change a single final and we have to say.) Really did not understand. The service that I feel no need to tip. Poor really good! Super disappointment will not be repeat customers. 🌑. There seafood is not fresh I even feel frozen shrimp to shrimp than Artin root fresh. ! Heaven. To 15% tip is really no blacksmith to face. Otherwise, go to this tip is really also want to vomit blood.  (Original) 最差的火锅没有之一 刚点单的时候 菜一直在漏上点10 样 3 样没上 第一轮点的东西 最后才上 。在吃的时候 服务员一直来加汤我就很想问 你怎么不一次性加多点 来了6 次。 我吃东西的心情都被毁了 然后汤底越吃越咸 彻底没有想吃的心情了 。 2 分钟 来一个服务员 在2分钟又来另外的服务员就是各种 换盘子 各种加汤超级乱的 exm？ 我就吃一顿火锅 至于吗。   最致命 单子那个服务员明明知道 错了 还给我们上单 ？ （ 没有点酒吧其他桌的客人点的酒加到我们 单子上去然后 我们 离前台近听到了对话。知道 错了还不改到最后上单了 才说。）真心没看懂。  这种服务就是我都觉得没必要给小费。 好差评 真的 ！ 超级失望 不会再是回头客。🌑。  还有海鲜还不新鲜  我甚至都觉得急冻的虾都比 阿廷根虾 来的新鲜。！ 苍天。  给了 15% 的小费没有 打铁 真的都是给 面子了。不然走了 就这样还想要 小费 真的是 吐血。

(Translated by Google) Extremely bad review! Service attitude is particularly poor and the environment is poor. The taste is not good and expensive. Especially the tableware is dirty and not cleaned. The people in the store don't care if they see it. Call him/her to change the tableware. They are reluctant to change the dishes. It is still dirty! Especially disgusting. This is the worst shop I have ever eaten! If you don't have to choose a star of 1-5, you won't even give it to half a star. Summary: Black Shop  (Original) 极度差评！服务态度特别差，环境也差。味道也不好，又贵。特别是餐具都是肮脏没有洗干净，店里人看到也都无所谓，叫他/她换个碗筷，还不情不愿，换到的碗碟也是还是脏的！特别让人恶心。这是我吃过最差的一家店！要不是一定要选1-5的星，不然连半星都不想给。总结：黑店

(Translated by Google) The hottest hotpot buffet in New York City, where guests cannot stop smoking. Asking the waiter to help get a thing for a glance, and leave directly regardless of us. The ground is full of rubbish, not sanitary, the dishes are dirty, and I feel disgusted in retrospect.  (Original) 全纽约最垃圾的火锅自助店，有客人在里面吸烟不制止。叫服务员帮忙拿个东西还白了一眼，直接走人不管我们。地面都是垃圾不做卫生，盘子都是脏的，回想起来都觉得恶心🤢

(Translated by Google) This is the last time I ate this store. First of all, this store was renovated and I felt very comfortable. But the food was very fresh, the vegetables were very dirty, the waiter did not give me a new one. Secondly, the waiter’s attitude was very poor. Talking to her, Ignore it, and the watermelon I delivered when I finally paid it, it’s really better not to send it, it’s rotten, I want to know if I can’t see it? Actually dare to give the guests a meal, definitely will not go again,  (Original) 这是我最后一次吃这家店，首先，这家店重新装修，感觉挺舒服的进去，但是食物非常不新鲜，蔬菜很dirty，服务员居然没有换新的给我，其次，服务员态度极差，与她谈话，爱理不理，最后付钱时送的西瓜，真的还不如不要送，都烂掉了，我想知道是看不到吗？居然还敢给客人吃，绝对不会再去了，
Really bad service. Barely any food for the price.
my second favorite hot pot place. Very affordable and tasting.
The food was fresh, especially the shrimps.
should be better.

This is nice dinner place.  They have seafood hot pot and the regular hot pot. But if you're have 2more person to go here, you can't order different hot pots. They said  same table everyone needed to order same hot pots. This was so sad. Me and my friends can't order one seafood hot pot and one regular hot pot.
Yummy, yummy 😋 😋😋 😋
Didn't like it

When we tried ordering they said they didn't speak English. They also brought us things we did not order. We also found a spider in one of the plates of vegetables we did not order either. They said "sorry" and took it away, like nothing was wrong and when I tried to give them a lesser tip they said no. Overall I thought it was bad service.
Very good restaurant 🤩🤩
Great place has good food at a good price and what they did with the place makes it look a lot nicer and service is getting better

Oh, it’s not very fresh. Say good seafood hot pot does not have seafood. However, the service staff inside is still very OK.  (Original) 差评。我们也是回头客。今天我们等了一个多小时，进去坐下来才吃一点，再点的时候点什么什么没有。🦐还不是很新鲜。说好的海鲜火锅进去居然没有海鲜。不过里面的服务人员还是很OK的。
(Translated by Google) Still hope that getting better and better  (Original) 还可以 希望越来越好
Love this place for a quick cheap hot pot however mandarin is preferred when ordering

(Translated by Google) I spent the last two days shopping here and found that the crab feet and swimming shrimps are not fresh. Every time I go to the things, I take them a little bit. After eating them, I have been diarrhea.  (Original) 前两天我到这边消费，发现蟹脚和游水虾都不新鲜，每次东西上的时候 都是拿那么一点点 ，后来吃完回去一直拉肚子
super place
Great service, great food. Really good hot pot place for a reasonable price

The food here is definitely good and fresh, however not for the experience we were offered here. There were about 10 of us and we were given a individual room for our group. We were all charged for hot pot and we ordered a ton of beer.  Some of the group arrived at a later timing, but we only were given two hours. But the server only stopped by once every thirty to fourty-five minutes and to deliver just some small plates of barely nothing. We ended up spending around $550, including a 20% tip and had to go home to cook a bag of ramen that costs $.55 cents to fill the stomach.

Food/soup base was very bland (pork bone and hebal). I had to add salt to it. Sesame sauce was disgusting. Wait staff seemed a bit rude when responding to me. Only giving two stars because the food hasn't killed me and bathroom was decent.

(Translated by Google) First-class service attitude, courtesy to the guests, every time the beauty at the front desk helps me to adjust the seasoning. The price of seafood hot pot is reasonable several times better than the incense.  (Original) 服务态度一流 对客人礼貌 每一次前台美女都帮我调调料 海鲜🦞火锅价格合理比香天下好数倍

(Translated by Google) Bad service attitude is not good, I went to eat with my family yesterday. It is not fresh for seafood. My husband said that my stomach hurts when I got home. It didn’t take long for me to get back to my stomach. I had a diarrhea yesterday, I am still diarrhea, and the front desk service is not. Well, the tip also asks people to take things. I won’t go to this house next time and spend money without saying that I still have bad stomach. 👎  (Original) 不好服务态度也不好，昨天跟家人去吃，很对海鲜不新鲜，回家路上我老公说肚子痛，回到家没多久我肚子也痛，昨天拉肚子，今天还在拉肚子，前台服务也不好👎👎👎👎，小费还要求别人拿东西，我下次不会去这家吃了花了钱不说还吃坏肚子。👎

Came here for dinner; didnt have to wait for seats. The concept was cool with the conveyor belt for certain items on the hotpot menu (ex: fishballs, seaweed knots, pumpkin, etc.). The items would be sent onto the conveyor belt and then brought around the tables for you to pick. 👍 good in terms of convenience and efficiency. Like the other all you can eat hotpot restaurnts, they have the general items like beef, lamb and then the veggies and some seafood items as well. The price for one person (regular hotpot) is $19.99, while for a seafood hotpot it is (I believe) $30 something per person.
Not bad. Good customer service and food got out fast. Very busy at night time. Come in Thursday for free beer and ice cream available.
nice place

Another AYCE hotpot in Brooklyn. The service is good jus as other Yelpers had mentioned. This is only good for those who like seafood. Other than that the non seafood items are limited. Overall the seafood was good. We ordered crabs, crab legs, giant prawns, oysters, small live shrimps, razor clams and etc. They have a small selection of quick bites (fish ball, wood ear fungus, ramen, straw mushrooms, sausages and 2 flavors of the same pastry) on the revolving belt. Overall the food is good but the seating layout and table is very cramped. I'm not a big person but I was trying not to knock down anything from the table. With 4 personal hotpots, a seafood platter and few plates here and there the table is already full. The hotpot is so close to you that you'll get a hotpot facial. The edge of the hotpot is just 2.5 inches from end of the table.  The table next to us ordered oysters and found a worm in one of it. The manager took the plate of oysters back without hesitation and asked them if they wanted another order - they declined. I would too, if I found a worm. Other than a worm in a oyster the small table the place is not bad.
Fresh seafood and great vibe.  A true gem in the neighborhood.

Don’t eat the seafood here! Especially the oysters and salmon. The oysters are cross contaminated with the dead crabs. Any oysters lover can tell the oysters were no good, washed down with water and bitter. Other seafood were pre cooked and stored in refrigerator waiting for you to reheat in the hotpot. Got food poisoning the next day. If you choose to go here after reading this, just dont order the seafood.

(Translated by Google) Fresh, good environment, good service, clean and tidy. Point seafood, that is to give you a little bit each time, so many times I am embarrassed...  (Original) 新鲜 ，环境好，服务态度也很好，干净整洁。点海鲜，就是每次给你一点点，叫多几次都不好意思了……

(Translated by Google) After eating, I went to the hospital to check that the things were not clean. The hospital explained that there was a virus in the seafood food. The female manager had to go to the 4th to charge the charges. Afterwards, everyone should be careful to see the Zhang Dan. Some tips are too outrageous. The front desk takes a young lady. The service is very poor, I hope everyone will not go to this garbage hot pot workshop in the future.  (Original) 吃了又去医院检查发现东西不干净，医院解释海鲜食物有病毒，这个女经理早去4乱收费的，以后大家要小心看清楚张单，还有的小费实在太离谱了，前台拿个小姐服务非常差,希望大家以后不要去这个垃圾火锅工坊。
Wait staff attentive but no 5 stars as they seems to always forget something you order. AYCE seafood buffet not bad.
(Translated by Google) Great value for money  (Original) 物超所值

My friends went there today as his birthday but ya gave him a very bad experience! All our friends and family won’t be coming to this place no more!Carefully when you go there they charge without asking!请改善你们的服务态度

(Translated by Google) My friend went to this hot pot restaurant to eat on his birthday today. As a result, the manager of their family gave a pit attitude. It’s not good. It’s a hot pot shop for your business, and it’s like this!  (Original) 我朋友今天生日去这家火锅店吃饭,结果被他们家的经理给坑了态度也不好👎👎八大道多的是火锅店给你们生意做，还这样！

(Translated by Google) First of all, as a repeat customer, we are sure of your service and food, so we will always support your family and recommend your home to friends. But from today, we and our friends and relatives will not go to your house again! Because we are guests, since we will ask for it, if this request does not meet the rules of your store, you can refuse as a merchant, I said it is acceptable, because this is the right of the store. But since the manager has promised to give us a discount, then don't say a set! Everyone is not a fool. This loss we are eating! ! !  (btw manager! When you say that the guest is deceiving later, please clean up your mind and say it. In fact, if you explain the words in a word and sentence in advance, there is nothing wrong with it. Instead of waiting for our checkout. Only tell us what this can't do! Then come and lie to someone! Sorry, we are not employees who are working with you, you don't explain how we know the rules??! The speech is like a palace, Interesting? We just come to eat! People, a mouth, say a hundred words! The attitude is correct, the character is noble, honest and courteous, it is admirable,!!!)  (Original) 首先作为回头客的我们，对你们的服务和食物是肯定的，所以才会一直支持你们家，向朋友推荐你们家。 但从今日起我们和我们的朋友亲人都不会再去你们家吃了！ 因为我们作为客人，既然我们会提要求，如果这个要求不符合你们店内规矩，作为商家的你们可以拒绝，我表示可以接受，因为这是店家的权利。但是经理既然已经答应给予我们优惠，那就不要说一套做一套！大家都不是傻子。这个亏我们是吃的起！！！  （btw经理！麻烦你以后说客人骗人的时，请把你脑清理一下再说。其实今天的事如果你提前把话一字一句的说清楚，就没啥事了。而不是等到我们结账时，才告诉我们这个不行什么的！然后又来一句骗人什么的！不好意思我们是客人不是跟你一起上班的员工，你不解释清楚我们怎么知道规则？？！讲话跟演宫心计似的，有意思吗？我们只是来吃饭好吗！人啊，一张嘴，说百话！心态端正，品才高尚，正直有礼，才让人敬佩，！！！）

As usually me and my friends came this place to celebrate my birthday today and I especially asked the manager at the front desk if I could still get a birthday meal on them because my birthday was yesterday.. which she said sure yah, she will only give me discount as the difference of the normal hot pot! When I finished all and she charge me the full price of it! Ridiculous trying to argue with me! Never come back this place! And remember this is not the first time that we had been here! Ya basically are throwing customers away and lie to the customer! 经理没有跟客人解释清楚！既然已经承认了客人，那又反口！那不好意思！作为客户的我们不能接受！不好意思朋友和家人已经不会再来光顾
Great food, great service

It's a decent place. I've always come with coworkers but never on my own, as there are definitely better options around the area. When I'd come in, we always had to wait around for 15-30mins for a spot (although we had called a few days prior to reserve). The service is alright, but I've seen better in other hotpot places near 8th Ave. Likewise, the food is what you'd experience in other hotpot spots, but they do offers a few food items that aren't given at other hotpot places, so those would be your "to-try" item.
(Translated by Google) The taste is good, the service attitude is also very good, that is, their tip is forced to receive according to the percentage.  (Original) 味道不错，服务态度也很好，就是他们的小费是按照百分比强制收到。
(Translated by Google) Time is not up, things are not given, things are slow  (Original) 时间没到，东西不给拿，东西出的慢
Cool ambience but food is only so so and seating isn't comfortable.  Staff do offer good service.
(Translated by Google) Personal feeling a bit pit. Nothing special. Sorry for this price!  (Original) 个人感觉有点坑.没什么特别之处.对不起这个价格！
Horrible experience. Wait too long for the food. Not pleasant atmosphere.

I give it a 3 because the food they use to be better but now stuff isnt as fresh as it use to be. If you come here eating seafood is worth the money but if you dont eat seafood.might be not worth it..not many option on the regular hot pot But overall the staff is friendly and good service

Love this place, food is fresh enough and they have plenty of options. The sauce bar choices are also decent. The service here is excellent, very attentive. Went during a busy time and they were still great. Will definitely come back again.

(Translated by Google) The service of this hot pot workshop is half and half, the platform is very poor, just asking you to tip, the seafood is not clean, the shrimp is still simmering, the crab is stinky, the oysters are a bit not fresh, I will not go again Real difference  (Original) 这个火锅工坊的服务一半半，企台非常差，只是叫你要小费,海鲜也不干净，在虾还有屎的，螃蟹是臭的，生蠔有点不生鲜的感觉，我不会再去，实在差

Love this place, food is fresh enough and they have plenty of options. The sauce bar choices are also decent. The service here is excellent, very attentive. Went during a busy time and they were still great. Will definitely come back again.
Just okay. Food is good, many of options. However the dinning environment is not relax or decent at all, the seats are very crowded....
They are super delicious and fast service, very kind
Service is horrible
Yummy yummy
So so...
All-you-can-eat place in Brooklyn, they offer fresh sea food which is a big plus! Definitely will give them 5 starts if quality of sauces is better.
Good price for all the options, all you can eat.

Food is fresh and portions are generous. Went with the basic hot pot with fish, meat, vegetable and random offerings. Had a great meal at midnight.

Just be aware that they may recycle the leftover food.

Keep calm it's hot pot season!  I love hot pot. My kids loves hot pot. Everyone loves hot pot. Who doesn't?  Who knew hot pot can be this fun?! A moving conveyor belt, not with sushi, but with plates of hot pot items!  AYCE for a great low price ($19.99 a person). The belt is never empty and around and around comes the little portions of fishballs and other staples. I've tried at least 3 of their soup bases, all of which rich in flavor. My favorite? Tomato. Pots were constantly refilled and skimmed.  The atmosphere is nice, lighting wasn't too dark. Decor looks trendy with a hint of British accents. Though, I felt cramped when it came to seating wise. No where to hang coats and bags, couldn't even do that behind my chair since they're rounded.  This place has quickly become our new favorite in the neighborhood.
Best seafood Hotpot in Brooklyn. Very attentive warmful service .Highly recommended .

The seafood is very fresh and full of food that satisfies the appetite of the company ’s food colleagues. Haha. The soup base is also very rich. The spicy pot is also very good. Service Health is also very intimate on call. It ca n’t be better. Highly recommended. I do n’t know why yelp reviews are bad (?).  (Original) 纽约最好的海鲜自助火锅.上周末组织了员工聚餐.同事推荐了这家店.当时看Yelp 评论感觉不是很好，有点犹豫，后来由于场地问题 manhattan 很难订到又大又能唱歌吃火锅的地方，所以还是来了.这不来不知道一来吓一跳. 海鲜非常新鲜 而且 满满 一大盘 满足了公司吃货同事的胃口.哈哈. 汤底也很浓郁.辣锅也很赞.服务生也是随叫随到非常贴心.简直不能再好.强烈推荐.不知道为啥yelp评论比较差(?) .

My go to hot pot spot! You pay per order but it's worth it. The cost is reflected in the quality compared to some all you can eat spots. The staff is really nice and attentive. Call and book a reservation on the weekends it gets packed quickly!

Hometown was a fun time! It was my first hotspot experience and I loved the variety of soups available (I got the curry,) meats (beef, chicken, pork and weird parts of animals,) and vegetables (pumpkin, corn, spinach, and so many mushrooms,) and of course, noodles.  Compared to many other places in Chinatown, Hometown felt pretty clean and welcoming to first timers. The menu definitely had some terrifying items, but wasn't too intimidating. They also had great options for vegetarians, as long as you each have your own pot.  The decor and vibes were pretty cool, young and hipster.  Would definitely go back!
